mapper.select: SELECT v.`id`, v.`appId`, (SELECT softwareName FROM app_info WHERE id=v.`appId`) appName, v.`versionNo`, v.`versionInfo`, v.`publishStatus`, (SELECT valueName FROM data_dictionary WHERE typeCode='PUBLISH_STATUS' AND valueId=v.`publishStatus`) AS publishStatusName, v.`downloadLink`, v.`versionSize`, v.`createdBy`, v.`creationDate`, v.`modifyBy`, v.`modifyDate`, v.`apkLocPath`, v.`apkFileName` FROM `app_version` AS v WHERE id=#{id}

SELECT av.`id`, av.`appId`, ai.`softwareName` appName, av.`versionNo`, av.`versionInfo`, av.`publishStatus`, dd.valuename publishStatusName, av.`downloadLink`, av.`versionSize`, av.`createdBy`, av.`creationDate`, av.`modifyBy`, av.`modifyDate`, av.`apkLocPath`, av.`apkFileName` FROM `app_version` av JOIN app_info ai ON(av.appid= ai.id) JOIN data_dictionary dd ON(av.publishStatus = dd.valueId) WHERE dd.typeCode='PUBLISH_STATUS' AND av.appId = #{appInfoId};
